        public void setFillColor(int fillColor)
        Changes fill color of the polygon
        Parameters:
        fillColor - color (not resource!) to fill polygon with. Alpha channel is supported.

        Parameters:
        strokeColor - color (not resource!) to draw lines with. Alpha channel is supported.

      • setStrokeColorOK

        public void setStrokeColorOK(int strokeColorOK)
        Changes stroke color of the polygon when result is OK.
        Parameters:
        strokeColorOK - color (not resource!) to draw lines with. Alpha channel is supported.

      • setStrokeWidth

        public void setStrokeWidth(float strokeWidth)
        Changes width of the stroke of the polygon.
        Parameters:
        strokeWidth - width of the stroke in pixels.

      • handleResult

        public boolean handleResult(ContourDetectorFrameHandler.DetectedFrame detectedFrame)
        Description copied from interface: ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler
        Called every time contour detection was performed on a frame.
        Specified by:
        handleResult in interface ContourDetectorFrameHandler.ResultHandler
        Parameters:
        detectedFrame - information about contour detection results on a single frame
        Returns:
        true if ContourDetectorFrameHandler should intercept given frame. false if ContourDetectorFrameHandler should not intercept given frame.
        See Also:
        PreviewBuffer
